data.comment: The match has started at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 2, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Alan Kelly signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Los Angeles Los Angeles's Carlos Vela is caught offside.
Carlos Vela puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Diego Rossi for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Alan Kelly awards Portland a goal kick.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
In the minute 13, Diego Rossi (Los Angeles) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In the minute 14, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Alan Kelly awards the home team a throw-in.
Alan Kelly signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 15, In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yimmi Chara (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 19, Los Angeles's Eduard Atuesta breaks free at Banc of California Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Latif Blessing (Los Angeles) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 30, Portland have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 31, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Diego Valeri (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Carlos Vela hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
In the minute 37, Portland have a goal kick.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Alan Kelly signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 43, Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 46, Alan Kelly has blown to start the second-half.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dejan Jakovic is on a sub for Jesus Murillo for Los Angeles.
In the minute 47, Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 52, Portland have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
Diego Rossi for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Diego Rossi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Los Angeles for Los Angeles.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Portland's Marvin Loria gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Los Angeles defender.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Portland are pushing forward but Diego Valeri's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Alan Kelly awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland push upfield but Alan Kelly quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 59, Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Portland.
Christian Torres for Los Angeles has been booked by Alan Kelly and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In the minute 67, Portland have been awarded a corner by Alan Kelly.
Dairon Asprilla is replacing Marvin Loria for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Alan Kelly signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Felipe Mora's header is off-target for Portland.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Los Angeles.
Alan Kelly awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Portland.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 73, Alan Kelly awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 75, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Eduard Atuesta.
Bob Bradley is making the team's second substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Brian Rodriguez replacing Christian Torres.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Cristhian Paredes with Andy Polo. This is the second substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Portland make their third substitution with Marco Farfan replacing Chris Duvall.
In the minute 78, Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 80, Eduard Atuesta is back on the pitch.
Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Dairon Asprilla is booked for the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kenneth Vermeer for Los Angeles who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Portland.
Kenneth Vermeer returns to the field for Los Angeles after picking up a slight injury.
Alan Kelly awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 87, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland drives forward and Felipe Mora gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
The home team replace Latif Blessing with Francisco Ginella.
In the minute 89, Mark Anthony Kaye is replacing Jose Cifuentes for the home team.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brian Rodriguez of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
At Banc of California Stadium the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Alan Kelly signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Los Angeles just outside Portland's area.
Portland needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Alan Kelly signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland at Banc of California Stadium.
Alan Kelly blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Jorge Villafana.
Diego Valeri instrumental with a fine assist.
Larrys Mabiala (Portland) gets a yellow card.
